thread.section_title: Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing!
thread.title_full: Amazing! - Review of Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jasmine29780
title: Amazing!
text: My partner surprised me with a trip to Paris for my birthday, we stayed at the Pullman Paris and from the moment we arrived we were welcomed beautifully and the whole staff seemed to know it was my Birthday! Our room had a balcony with a spectacular view over the Eiffel Tower. We ordered room service on our first day and the food was delicious. Can't wait to return!
